title: How to Make Oat Soap Bags

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients together in a bowl.
steps.description: You can grate the soap straight over the bowl if wished.

steps.headline: Spoon the mixture into a cloth bag.
steps.description: Tie or sew the bag together.

steps.headline: Use the same way as a washcloth when taking a shower.
